extendedInfo.description: In the United States of America the people choose officials to make laws and represent their views and concerns in government. Using your residential address zip code, you can figure out who represents your rights in the US Senate and the US House of Representatives, who is your state Governor and what is the capital of your state. The data is extracted from official government websites in one click.Mainly,  the App is a supplement to the US Citizenship Civics Practice.Features:â Ability to look up zip code by street address.â Direct links to websites where the data come from.â Ability to pass the data to the US Citizenship Civics Practice App.â Ability to edit ambiguous or failed entry.â Portrait and Landscape view. Visit http://www.pinchandchuck.com/exam.html#state for more information and screenshots.Visit http://www.passcitizenshipexam.com/variableAnswers/index.html to find the data on-line as well as look up the US Government diagram.Please contact our developers directly if you would like to report a problem or have a feature suggestion: exam@pinchandchuck.comGood luck!
